resources.string:
Accelerometer data Collection and Analysis.

 Transforms accelerometer file data to Excel spreadsheet 'Accolyze/copy.xls'. Edit template spreadsheet 'Accolyze/input.xls'; columns 1-5 will be over-written by data.

 	Analyze: Kingsoft Office 
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=cn.wps.moffice_eng

 	Collect: Accelerometer Monitor
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lul.accelerometer
 _________________________________
